biography: Tomas, a familiar name from Espoo Ringside Golf, has graced the fairways of the Hector Trophée on three occasions. Known for his contemplative demeanor on the course, Tomas approaches each shot with a meticulousness that some find admirable, and others... less so.

Despite his strategic approach, Tomas has yet to capture the coveted Hector Trophée or the individual Victor Trophy. Though he may not be participating in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025, the possibility of a return remains open. Whether he returns to competition or not, his presence has certainly been felt at past events.
